title: Firefox for Android 51.0.2 Release

notes.note:
Reference link for [51.0 release notes for Firefox for Android][1]


  [1]: https://www.mozilla.com/firefox/android/51.0/releasenotes/

Fix a crash caused by an Android library (Palette) on some x86 devices (Bug [1318667][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1318667

text: We'd also like to extend a special thank you to all of the new Mozillians who contributed to this release of Firefox!
system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
